summary: Need to make an own facial skin for PureSkin, and want to do it fast? Also included Easy eye creator.
descriptionHtml:
[center][u][color=#ead1dc][size=5][b]What is this mod?[/b][/size][/color][/u]
By hiding and unhiding layers, you can create an own facial skin for a follower or your player character.
Why look like everyone else? I also allow people to alter my or use it as a base for other skins. Just change the hue on each layer.
I also included a PSD with easy eye creator, it´s very easy to use.

Requires some knowledge on photo or image edit software.

[color=#c27ba0][size=5][u][b]But why?[/b][/u][/size][/color]
Why not? Looking original is awesome. Furthermore, your follower will really stick out even more.
It´s addictive fun according to people who got to use the Alpha :D
Not everyone is great at the software, and this is a great way to start.

[size=5][u][b][color=#f1c232]CREDIT:[/color][/b][/u][/size][/center][center][b][i][url=https://t.umblr.com/redirect?z=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fusers%2F27578610&t=NTEwNWRmMzliZTJhMWE4YjVjOWY1ZTViYTQ1ZjYwN2Y4YjE5Njg5NixINFhjQm5udg%3D%3D&b=t%3Ajkn5CX_x5qqnT-N-d-XwXg&p=https%3A%2F%2Fmassivemaster.tumblr.com%2Fpost%2F176739136190%2Fdownload-link-what-is-this-file-it-allows-you&m=1]regenbot03[/url]  and her/his/ their skin PureSkin[/i][/b]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2209393]hellosanta[/url] [i][b]and her/his/ their skin SG Female Textures[/b][/i][/center]
author: MassiveMaster
